Posts.Content: Thank you so much, my friend.  I know it's only been a short time, but it's just getting waring to feel pain all the time.  I'll just continue to be a good patient and take Motrin when I need to and wait and pray for this pain to evaporate.  As soon as it does, I'll post the good news!!
Posts.Title: Bi-Lateral Lumpectomy/mastectomy with immediate reconstruction. 2 weeks post op with pain in both breasts.

Posts.Content: I had somewhere between a lumpectomy and mastectomy on both breasts 2-1/2 weeks ago.  I had immediate reconstruction.  I don't have any pain under my arms, but both breasts are VERY sensitive and painful.  They still feel numb to the touch, but they hurt from the inside out all the time.  It feels like every nerve in my breasts is raw and exposed.  Sometimes it feels like I get the chills across them.  Has anyone else had this and is it normal.  Please tell me it goes away.  I'm ready to stop thinking about my breasts all the time, but it's hard when they always hurt!
Posts.Title: Bi-Lateral Lumpectomy/mastectomy with immediate reconstruction. 2 weeks post op with pain in both breasts.
